title: My Wish Is Two Separate Beds - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Charming Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Contracts   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Dense Protagonist   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Royalty   Slow Growth at Start   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Unrequited Love
author: Ahn Siha   안시하
description:
Julia, Queen of Semele, has a problem. It is because her husband, Endimion, was the same age as her. They have been a married couple out of convenience since childhood. The two are like siblings, having used the same bed for 12 years and gone through puberty together. But one day, their relationship changed… 

“Do you really have to sleep in the same bed as me? You should fix this habit. Otherwise, the concubine who will carry your child will be disappointed...”

“A concubine who will bear my child?”

In an instant, their eye-level changed. In a daze, Julia looked up at Endimion climbing on top of her body. 

“My child, I will make it with you.” 

Her hair stood on edge to his breath tickling behind her ear. Julia bit her lips tightly. After the unsavory incident, it is really uncomfortable sleeping in the same bed with my husband. Please, can't we use two beds?>
